Comments_List: Knowledge of major piano repertoire and performance practices for both solo and chamber situations.
If your teacher is good, like mine was, it's a useful course. You should be practicing.
If you want to improve as a musician, take this course.
Yes. The ability to study music performance at a high level is one of the hallmarks of a Yale education.
